thread.section_title: Fork To Spoon - Your Guide for Everything Air Fryer and Instant Pot
thread.title: TGIF: Feel-Good Friday Recipes to Kick Off the Weekend
thread.title_full: TGIF: Feel-Good Friday Recipes to Kick Off the Weekend

author: Laurie
title: TGIF: Feel-Good Friday Recipes to Kick Off the Weekend
text:
Forget the Monday blues! It’s Friday, and that means it’s time to celebrate with some delicious and easy-to-make recipes. Whether you’re craving something comforting, something healthy, or something simply indulgent, we’ve got you covered. Get ready to kick off the weekend with a smile and a full belly with these feel-good Friday recipes.
Air Fryer Risotto Balls (Arancini) Air Fryer Arancini or Air Fryer Italian Rice Balls — —Do you love Italian food? This is one of the best recipes! These make for a great appetizer or snack!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Arancini
Air Fryer Tortellini Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Crispy Spinach & Ricotta Fried Tortellini are excellent; there is nothing better than some Air Fryer Crispy Tortellini. This makes the perfect appetizer, snack, light lunch, or supper.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Crispy Spinach & Ricotta Fried Tortellini
Air Fryer Manicotti Air Fryer Manicotti — Do you ever crave a luxurious Italian meal but don’t want to try standing at the stovetop for hours? Well, now your dreams are answered with this delicious Air Fryer Manicotti recipe!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Manicotti
Air Fryer Roasted Olives Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Roasted Olives — Using your air fryer is a quick and easy way to make flavorful olives. These are perfect for a party or an appetizer. You can even use them as a pizza topping! The best part about this recipe is that it only takes 5 minutes of your time, plus you get the benefits of cooking in olive oil without having to turn on the oven!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Roasted Olives
Air Fryer Fried Olives Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Do you love fried olives? I know I do. But, I also know that frying them can be a bit of a pain. It’s messy and takes up a lot of oil. That’s why I’m so excited to share this air fryer fried olives recipe with you. Not only is it easier than traditional frying, but it still yields the same delicious results. Let me show you how it’s done!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Fried Olives
Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. There’s nothing better than a creamy, flavorful dinner that requires minimal effort. With an air fryer, you can make delicious meals in no time at all! Today, I will show you how to make Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells – combining the tastes of two classic Italian favorites into one hearty dish.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Chicken Alfredo Stuffed Shells
Air Fryer Lasagna Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Indulge in a comforting classic with a modern twist: Air Fryer Lasagna! Made with Italian sausage, 3 types of cheeses, and tender lasagna noodles, it’s hearty, comforting, and totally delicious! This easy air recipe is perfect for busy weeknights — plus it’s one of the best air fryer beginner recipes.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Lasagna
Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta is fantastic! This is a perfect summertime treat, with the fresh bounty of strawberries
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Strawberry Mascarpone Bruschetta
Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards — Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards are the perfect party appetizer! They are easy to assemble and can be made ahead of time.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Charcuterie Boards
Air Fryer Tomato Gallette If you are looking for an easy recipe this Christmas Season, reach no further than my recipe for Air Fryer Tomato Galette!
Air Fryer Tomato Galette
Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan My Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan are amazing! Topped with a mixture of cheese, breadcrumbs, and seasoning and then air fried until nice and crispy, they come out perfectly roasted every time. Prepped and ready in 20 minutes total.
Get the recipe : Air Fried Tomatoes with Parmesan
Air Fryer Babybel Cheese Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Make Air Fryer Babybel Cheese for a quick, easy, and healthy way to enjoy this snack food. The inside gets nice and gooey while the outside is crispy, seasoned perfection.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Babybel Cheese
Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli — Hey there, foodies and Trader Joe’s enthusiasts!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Trader Joe’s Lobster Ravioli
Air Fryer Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Recreate the classic Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli in your air fryer! Crispy, cheesy, and perfectly golden, this easy copycat recipe is the ultimate appetizer or snack.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Olive Garden Toasted Ravioli
Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Indulge in the irresistible crunch of Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta, filled with a medley of gooey, zesty cheeses. Resembling petite pasta mozzarella sticks, these fried delights are a flavor-packed sensation. Experience the magic of my Olive Garden-inspired Stuffed Ziti Fritta recipe and savor the explosion of flavors in every bite!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Olive Garden Stuffed Ziti Fritta
Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters –Introducing Air Fryer Cacio e Pepe Fritters – a delightful twist on the classic Roman pasta dish, transformed into bite-sized, crispy delights that promise to tantalize your taste buds.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Cacio E Pepe Fritters
Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli — Do you love air fryer recipes? Well, then you are going to love this Italian beef stromboli. It is a quick and easy recipe that only takes about 25 minutes from start to finish. Plus, it is so delicious! The combination of beef, cheese, and sauce flavors is just amazing. You are going to love this recipe!
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Beef Stromboli
Air Fryer Baked Ziti Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Baked Ziti — Calling all pasta lovers and cheese enthusiasts! Craving that warm, gooey, cheesy goodness of classic baked ziti but short on time and patience ?
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Baked Ziti
Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich is my new grilled cheese sandwich creation!! If you loved my classical Air Fryer Grilled Cheese, you would love this one.
Get the recipe : Air Fryer Italian Grilled Cheese Sandwich
Air Fryer Pizza Wontons Air Fryer Pizza Wontons — Dive into the world of crispy, cheesy goodness with our Air Fryer Pizza Wontons!
Air Fryer Pizza Wontons
Air Fryer Mug Pizza Image Credit: Fork to Spoon. Air Fryer Pizza In A Mug — Looking for a quick and easy meal that’s sure to please? Look no further than air fryer pizza in a mug!
Get the recipe : air fryer mug pizza
